Posts.Content: While your at it you could teach your screeners what the actual definition of trolling is: Trolling: Carefully and systematically search an area for something. ‘a group of companies trolling for partnership opportunities’ with object ‘I spent tonight trolling the Internet for expensive lighting gear’ More example sentences 2.1 Fish by trailing a baited line along behind a boat. ‘we trolled for mackerel’ More example sentencesSynonyms 3 British Walk in a leisurely way; stroll. ‘we all trolled into town’ More example sentences 4 with object Sing (something) in a happy and carefree way. ‘he trolled a note or two’ This way they won't pull posts that use the word properly.
Posts.Title: YOU made an Inspire glossary!
